```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(raster)
library(viridis)
library(sf)
library(gstat)
library(terra)
library(pracma)
```

```{r}
n_data <- read_csv(here("knb-lter-mcr.5038.10", "MCR_LTER_Adam_EcolAp_N_summary_20200331.csv")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  clean_names()

nut_bound <- read_csv(here("knb-lter-mcr.5038.10", "MCR_LTER_Adam_EcolAp_Nut_boundary_20200331.csv")) %>% 
  as.data.frame()


  
```

```{r}
#moorea crs EPSG:2976 Need to check with Tom what they want
crs <- 2976
jan_n_data <- n_data %>% 
  dplyr::select(longitude, latitude, percent_n_jan)



ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = jan_n_data, mapping = aes(x = longitude, y = latitude, color = percent_n_jan),
             size = 3) + 
  scale_color_viridis(option = "B") +
  theme_classic()



bound <- nut_bound %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("X", "Y"), crs = crs) %>%
  summarise(geometry = st_combine(geometry)) %>% 
  st_cast("POLYGON") %>% 
  mutate(geometry = st_transform(geometry, "+proj=longlat +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84"))

shp_bound <- st_write(bound, here("shape_files", "bound.shp"), delete_dsn=TRUE)
bound <- read_sf(here("shape_files", "bound.shp")) %>% 
   mutate(geometry = st_transform(geometry, "+proj=longlat +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84")) %>% 
  st_set_crs(crs)

  
ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = bound, col = "black", fill = NA) +
  theme_classic() +
  geom_point(data = jan_n_data, mapping = aes(x = longitude, y = latitude, color = percent_n_jan),
             size = 3) + 
  scale_color_viridis(option = "B") +
  coord_sf(crs = crs)



borderpolygon <- list(data.frame(nut_bound[,1], nut_bound[,2]))

krig1 <- kriging(jan_n_data$longitude, jan_n_data$latitude, jan_n_data$percent_n_jan, pixels=1000, polygons=borderpolygon)


```
